name: SnowCraft
description:
Over 30 million players from 200+ countries have made this snowball fight classic one of the most popular and beloved games on the web. Now the fun continues on your iPhone.

"It's so addicting! I just got to the bonus level..and died!...now I can't stop until I win- I MUST BEAT THIS GAME!!! so much for working on my presentation." – solarxmoon

“A fast and furious action game, very smooth graphics, simple yet addictive gameplay and that magical ‘just one more level’ appeal. Two thumbs up!” - Home of the Underdogs Review

“SnowCraft brings back the days of youth, and winter, in an ice-cold battle for turf supremacy. Your group of kids is out to clobber the team on the other side. You tap to determine the velocity of your throw, all the while dodging snowballs from the other team…and just when you're ready to pat yourself on the back for taking out the opposing team, here comes a whole new group ... with even more kids!” – PC World

“omggggggggg i LUV this game!!!!!!! ahhhh” - Jacqueline C.

“ok, I really need to stop. SERIOUSLY. I have a headache from staring at the screen, my snowball wrist hurts like hell (I think it's actually swollen - it looks bigger than the other side) and I see snowballs whenever I close my eyes... that's it! I'm not playing snowcraft AT ALL for the rest of the night!”

“One of the most well-known Internet games of today, this fun little game where you have to knock over your opponents in a snowball fight, will keep you playing again and again. The game looks, sounds and feels great, and gives your whole computer a feeling of winter. – GoFish Games

Visit us: snowcraftgame.com

Happy Holidays!
